title: Frederick Douglass National Historic Site: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     February 19, 2016  Frederick Douglass National Historic Site featured in new partnership with Google  Visitors can virtually tour Frederick Douglassâ€™ home from anywhere with a 360-degree interior view of Cedar Hill and learn about artifacts from his life, thanks to a new partnership between the National Park Service and Google.   February 10, 2016  Celebrate Frederick Douglass's Birthday with Free Programs and a Behind-the-Scenes Look at One of America's Civil Rights Heroes  Join the National Park Service and community partners for a host of inspiring free programs on February 12-13 to celebrate the 198th birthday of Frederick Douglass and honor his legacy in historic Anacostia.   December 15, 2015  NPS Announces Winners of Frederick Douglass National Historic Site Oratorical Contest  The National Park Service held its annual oratorical contest at the Frederick Douglass National Historic Site on December 11-12. Eighty students competed.   October 06, 2015  Celebrate Family Fun Day at Frederick Douglass National Historic Site on October 18  Celebrate the life of Frederick Douglass with a day of family-friendly fun.
